description: Bisulfite-Seq data for 6 mature neutrophil sample(s). 79 run(s), 6 experiment(s), 6 alignment(s). Part of BLUEPRINT release January 2015. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20140811/homo_sapiens/README_bisulphite_analysis_CNAG_20140811
title: BLUEPRINT release January 2015, Bisulfite-Seq for mature neutrophil
